name: Watermelon Slice Cookies
steps: In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar. Beat in egg and extract. Combine the flour, baking powder and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture.
Set aside 1 c. of dough. Tint remaining dough red; shape into a 3 1/2 in diameter log.
Wrap in plastic wrap. Wrap remaining plain dough. Refrigerate for 2 hours or until firm.

On a slightly floured surface, roll plain dough into a 8.5x3.5 in rectangle. roll up. Roll green dough into a 10 x 3.5 in rectangle. Place red and white log on end of a short side of green dough; roll up. Wrap in plastic wrap and refrigerate overnight.

Unwrap and cut into 3/16 in slices. Place 2 in apart on ungreased baking sheets. Can use raisins or sesame seeds for seeds if desired, put on the cookies at this stage. Bake at 350 for 9-11 minutes or until firm. immediately cut cookies in half. Remove to wire racks to cool. About 3 dozen cookies.
